google_reviews.author: Erika Redzinak
google_reviews.review: We moved in at the end of July and Kendall and Tim have been great. Of course with any new apartment, things are already chipping off like the cheap paint on the back door and interior doors. But regardless, we love our place and being near the park and everything else! We have enjoyed the community space upstairs, too!

google_reviews.author: Harjit
google_reviews.review: We moved in early September 2024. Tim and Payton provided prompt and courteous service. We scheduled a tour and Tim followed up with us in the morning for our scheduled tour. During application process and lease signing, Tim was quick to respond and also followed up for any questions. It was quick and smooth process with user friendly system. Management does a great job, and building is new and in good shape. It is a quiet place and is close to all amenities. It is located next to Cordata park - with walking trails, pickleball and basketball court and nice play area for kids. An ideal place.

owner_response.text: Thanks for your feedback! We are so glad you enjoy what Celestia has to offer, and we're glad our team has been helpful! If there is ever anything we can do to make your experience better, please let us know.

google_reviews.author: Tokeya Berry
google_reviews.review: Tim and Jaime made the move in process efficient, personal, and treated me like a true resident upon my first interaction at Celestia. It is a beautiful and well managed location.

google_reviews.author: Jonah Schultz
google_reviews.review: Im loving this new building! Its in a great spot just off the main roads and getting groceries and shopping at the mall has always been a quick ride away. The staff is very friendly, Tim and Jaime have been greatly helpful in answering any questions and addressing concerns.

google_reviews.author: Kody Giltner
google_reviews.review: Great place to live for dog owners right next to a beautiful new park with 1 mile trail loop. Building is clean and quiet. Wish there were trash bins in common areas.

google_reviews.author: Makayla dorning
google_reviews.review: i moved in early June 2024, payton and tim were awesome throughout the entire process, i ended up switching units during that time and they made it very smooth. tim has been excellent in making sure any issues Ive have had are resolved. its a great place, definitely recommend!!

owner_response.text: Our goal is to provide top notch customer service, and we're so glad to hear our team has been helpful! Thanks for your review!

google_reviews.author: Lorie Noble
google_reviews.review: A beautiful building in a peaceful environment! We experienced such amazing service with Kendal Kelly in helping us secure an apartment there last month . She helped us select the right apartment for us and assisted us in completing the application as we were in a time crunch to find something right away . Both Tim and Kendal were there to assist and help us with our move in day . We are so grateful to have found this place in Bellingham!

owner_response.text: We're so glad to hear you've had a great experience so far! If there's anything else we can assist you with, please let us know.

google_reviews.author: Addison Brown
google_reviews.review: I love it here, the best apt Ive lived in and the property managers are awesome and so helpful!

google_reviews.author: Emily Rodriguez
google_reviews.review: such a beautiful place to live! management is awesome and the views are beautiful.

owner_response.text: Thanks for leaving a review! We're so glad to hear you're happy with the community and service!

summary.text:
Good

Celestia Apartments has received numerous positive sentiments from users regarding their overall living experience. Many users praised the property management team for being responsive and efficient during the application and move-in processes. For instance, a user highlighted how Tim and Payton provided courteous service, making it easy to transition into their new home. The location is also noted as a big plus, being close to amenities and recreational spaces like nearby parks, which enhances the living experience.

The community atmosphere at Celestia Apartments is highly regarded, with users enjoying not only the facilities but also the friendliness of the management team. Reviewers have mentioned that the efficiency and helpfulness of staff create a welcoming environment. One user specifically appreciated the assistance they received from Kendal Kelley, who went above and beyond to help secure their apartment while under time constraints. Such customer service takes the living experience to a more pleasant level, as echoed in several reviews.

Great

The apartment features and the overall management received high marks with an average rating of 4.8. Users expressed satisfaction with the well-maintained building and gratefulness for the beautiful views and serene environment. New residents have particularly enjoyed the community space upstairs and the spacious layout that allows for a comfortable living experience. The proximity to parks with amenities like walking trails is also a common highlight among user reviews.

Moreover, timely communications and follow-ups from management have been frequently mentioned, contributing to a smooth leasing process. Users have experienced organized and user-friendly systems when applying and signing leases, which made transitions less stressful. The positive experiences shared within the community have created a strong sense of belonging for its residents, further elevating their overall satisfaction.

Bad

This highlights that some tenants might experience minor inconveniences that could be addressed. While the service was generally good, implementing simple solutions could potentially enhance satisfaction levels even further. These user concerns suggest that the management team could benefit from regular assessments of common area maintenance and functionality, ensuring consistent upkeep and practicality for residents.

Ugly

Fortunately, there are no severe complaints or 'ugly' aspects reported in user reviews for Celestia Apartments. The overwhelming majority of feedback is positive, focusing on aspects like responsiveness, community environment, and pleasant living conditions. There were no indicators of persistent issues such as neglecting maintenance requests or problems with security deposits. This speaks to a well-managed property that is maintaining a good relationship with its residents, which is essential for a positive living experience.

As no critical incidents or serious dissatisfaction stories emerged in user reviews, it appears that Celestia Apartments successfully addresses tenants' needs through proactive management. This type of environment allows for a focus on community and overall enjoyment rather than dealing with problematic situations. Maintaining this positive trend could ensure continued satisfaction and a great reputation for the property management team.
